name: Absolute Zero

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect also works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Frost Benediction
weaponEffects.description: Increase the entire team's frost ATK by **5%** when Benediction resonance is active.

advancements: After dodging, summon a healing bee that follows the user and heals the ally with the lowest percentage of HP within **15** meters. Heal for **25%** of ATK and restore **50** weapon charge points each time and last for **25** seconds. Cooldown: **25** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.

Use ***Sanctuary*** or discharge skills to remove debuffs from targets, can be used while being affected by control effects. Increase shatter and damage dealt for all teammates within range by **20%**, and grant them immunity to control effects and shatter.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Increase healing effect by **15%**, plus an additional **20%** when healing targets with less than **60%** HP.

Whenever a healing bee is summoned or disappears from battle, heal all allies for **100%** of the user's ATK. All allies within **10** meters of the healing bee also gain **15%** all damage and healing boost (cannot stack).

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.

abilities.name: Soaring Barrage
abilities.description: While airborne or after jumping once, tap normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.

abilities.name: Moonfall
abilities.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall. Upon landing, deal damage once every **0.2** seconds, for a total of **123.8%** of ATK + **7** damage.

abilities.name: Focused Assault
abilities.description: After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming **300** points of endurance.
breakdown: Pull in enemies in front of the user, **suspending them** and dealing damage equal to **34.9%** of ATK + **2** every **0.3** seconds (up to **4** times).
**40.4%** of ATK + **2** at the target location and to nearby enemies every **0.3** seconds.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Surge. Each wave of energy deals damage equal to **45.9%** of ATK + **2** to targets. Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

abilities.name: Tesseract
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast. Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to **66.4%** of ATK + **3** to targets in its path every **0.3** seconds (up to 5 times). Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

abilities.name: Sanctuary
abilities.description: Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for **95%** of ATK + **5** once every **0.5** seconds for **6** seconds. **60**-second cooldown.

abilities.name: Swift Deliverance
abilities.description: When a ***weapon is fully charged*** or triggers ***Phantasia***, switching to this weapon from another weapon **removes all debuffs from the wielder**, and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus healing nearby Wanderers and allies for **118.8%** x ATK + **6** HP for **7** seconds.

recommendedMatrices.name: Cocoritter
recommendedMatrices.description: Great choice for Absolute Zero that will increase healing and provide an attack buff to allies.

recommendedMatrices.name: Zero
recommendedMatrices.description: Decent option that shields and buffs allies when using discharge skills.

recommendedMatrices.name: Meryl

recommendedMatrices.description: Decent option to build weapon charge while using Absolute Zero.
